actions.subcommittee: Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice

official_title: A bill to amend the State Justice Institute Act of 1984 regarding the disclosure of research or statistical information furnished under that Act.

summary.text: Amends the State Justice Institute Act of 1984 to provide that research and statistical information furnished under such Act: (1) shall be immune from legal process; (2) shall not, without the consent of the person furnishing such information, be admitted into evidence or used in any judicial, legislative, or administrative proceeding; and (3) shall not be used or revealed for purposes other than the purpose for which it was obtained.

titles.title: A bill to amend the State Justice Institute Act of 1984 regarding the disclosure of research or statistical information furnished under that Act.
